function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on community thinking may not always be practical or efficient in solving problems.","Impact":"Ineffective problem-solving and decision-making, leading to delays or suboptimal solutions.","Mitigation":"Provide training on problem-solving and decision-making skills to enhance individual capabilities within the community.","Technologies":"Collaboration platforms and decision support systems for community-based problem-solving.","People":"Community members, leaders, and decision-makers.","Owner":"Community leaders, training facilitators."},{"Description":"Inequality in modern society due to emphasis on individualism over community spirit.","Impact":"Social and economic disparities, lack of support for vulnerable individuals or groups during crises.","Mitigation":"Promote community engagement and support through policies, programs, and awareness campaigns.","Technologies":"Social networking platforms, community forums, and information sharing tools.","People":"Marginalized and vulnerable populations, community leaders, policymakers.","Owner":"Government, NGOs, community organizations."},{"Description":"Relying on communal support for renovation work may pose health risks during contagious disease outbreaks.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to close physical interaction during community mobilization for renovation work.","Mitigation":"Implement health and safety guidelines for communal activities, provide protective equipment, and promote awareness of disease prevention measures.","Technologies":"Remote collaboration tools, virtual training platforms, and digital communication systems.","People":"Community members participating in renovation work, public health authorities, community leaders.","Owner":"Health and safety organizations, community leaders, local government."}]}
